dataIdInfo.idAbs: This table contains the public Electric, Gas, and Cable utility providers for each Massachusetts municipality. The source of data for Electric and Natural Gas was the Massachusetts Department of Public Utilities, September 2021. The source of data for Cable utilities was the Massachusetts Department of Telecommunications and Cable, November 2019. The table is stored as TOWNS_POLY_UTILITIES and may be joined to any community boundaries layer on the TOWN_ID column.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Display public Electric, Natural Gas, and Cable utility providers by municipality.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Massachusetts Department of Public Utilities, Massachusetts Department of Telecommunications and Cable
dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1.4959

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Modified label for natural gas provider for map legends. The text "Municipal" is used instead of the community's power company (which is stored in the GAS field).
Modified label for cable TV provider for map legends. The text "Municipal" is used instead of the community's cable company (which is stored in the CABLE field).
Indicates if a municipality provides its own internet service
Modified label for electricity provider for map legends. The text "Municipal" is used instead of the community's power company (which is stored in the ELEC field).

attr.attrdefs: Massachusetts Department of Telecommunications and Cable
